physical_examinations.vital_signs: Height: 114.6 cm (SDS: -2.36), Weight: 22.2 kg (SDS: -2.3), BMI: 16.9 kg/m2, Head circumference: 48.6 cm (more than 2 SD below mean)
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: The patient was slightly microcephalic with a bifid uvula. His upper to lower body ratio was normal at 1.01, and bone age was between 9 and 10 years according to the Greulich and Pyle standards.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Height SDS: -2.305, Height velocity: 7.2 cm/yr, Serum glucose: 82 mg/dl
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Notable findings included Tanner II scrotal hair with the testes remaining at prepubertal size.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Height velocity increased from 2.8 cm/yr pretreatment to 5.6 cm/yr after 9 months of GH therapy, and further to 7.2 cm/yr at last report.
